game.name: Stock the Shelves
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: A Frantic Store Management Sim. Create the best shop you can imagine, then make it better! Manage, Upgrade, Keep Customers Happy, but most importantly STOCK THOSE SHELVES!
game.shortDescriptionEn: A Frantic Store Management Sim. Create the best shop you can imagine, then make it better! Manage, Upgrade, Keep Customers Happy, but most importantly STOCK THOSE SHELVES!
